 Frees HP guard. The pointer guarded may be deleted after this.
ThreadGC & getGC () const

 Protects the pointer p against reclamation (guards the pointer).

Detailed Description

Auto HPGuard.

This class incapsulates Hazard Pointer guard to protect a pointer against deletion . It allocates one HP from thread's HP array in constructor and free the HP allocated in destruction time.
